"Dromes":
"The Vanford Laboratory area contains a special type of enemy called \"Dromes\".

When defeated, a Drome will join you as an ally and fight alongside you for a set time."

"When you defeat another Drome while you have a Drome following you, your follower Drome's form will change.

As a Drome's form changes, it gains new ranged attacks and support skills that it can use to assist you."
